text: keh dijiye ke kya mein tumhe batao?ke is se bhi zyada bore ajr pane wala Allah tala ke nazdik kaun hai ? wo jis par Allah tala ne lanath ki aur us par wo ghussa hoa aur un mein se baz ko bandar aur suwwar bana diya aur jinhone mabodaane batil ki parastish ki yahi log budhâ€™tar darje wale hai aur yahi rahe rasth se bahuth zyada bhatakne wale hai
